authority_domain_codes.description: Requests for definitive diagnoses, prescriptions, or medical finality beyond informational guidance.
Requests for definitive legal verdicts, filings, or jurisdiction-specific finality beyond general information.
Requests for definitive investment/tax/accounting instructions beyond general education.

harm_point_trigger_codes.description: Instructions that could enable biological harm or unsafe lab/procurement behavior.
Instructions enabling construction or use of weapons or violent wrongdoing.
Content that promotes or enables self-harm.
Instructions intended to facilitate non-violent illegal activity or evasion.

notes: Taxonomy is a governance input for stewardship gating; it does not assert empirical truth claims.
